title: PGIM's Marcus: Affordable Housing a Good Investment
description: Cathy Marcus, Co-Head and Global Chief Operating Officer of Real Estate at PGIM, says affordable housing is an attractive investment across multiple demographic segments. She speaks with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
